entry.title: Extremal divisors on moduli spaces of rational curves with marked points
entry.summary: We study effective divisors on ${M}_{0,n}$, focusing on hypertree divisors introduced by Castravet-Tevelev and the proper transforms of divisors on ${M}_{1,n-2}$ introduced by Chen-Coskun. Results include a database of hypertree divisor classes and closed formulas for Chen-Coskun divisor classes. We relate these two types of divisors, and from this construct extremal divisors on ${M}_{0,n}$ for $ n \geq 7$ that furnish counterexamples to the conjectural description of the effective cone of ${M}_{0,n}$ given by Castravet-Tevelev.
entry.arxiv:comment: Typos corrected, introduction reorganized for v2
